column5: Going to pre-fish at the Sault with a friend, wondering if on-line sevice for license is available? Did a search, found info for phone purchase, but I don't think I have enough time. thanks

Try this website it is a bait shop in Windsor, Ontario: http://www.wallysbait.com/ If order it today they will have it in the mail tomorrow. They come across to Detroit to send out licenses on Thursday. I would think you would get in a week or less, I usually get it the next day because I live just south of Detroit. BOB
any chance of quebec offering the same? we always seem to be going through in the middle of the night and have probs. finding a place that's open.

You can get the license at the welcome center just across the bridge in Soo, Ont. Cross the bridge, turn right and its on the left side of the street. You'll spend about 15 minutes getting it done, and the toll both ways of course. But, it is quick.
